document.full_text: a minor injury to tim duncan puts the spurs' questionable defense even further in doubt, but the seldom used tiago splitter could give san antonio a defensive boost.
document.title: an unintended cameo for splitter in duncan's absence
lines_and_colors: a minor injury to tim duncan puts the spurs' questionable defense even further in doubt, but the seldom used tiago splitter could give san antonio a defensive boost.
